name: SiriProxy on Raspberry Pi
short_description:
This is an SD card image with RVM, Ruby, and SiriProxy pre-installed.  

Release notices: https://sourceforge.net/p/siriproxyrpi/news/

Instructions: https://sourceforge.net/p/siriproxyrpi/wiki/Home/
